Patients receive doxorubicin HCl liposome IV 2.5 hour , follow vincristine bolus IV 5 minute day 1 . Dexamethasone administer orally IV day 1-4 . Treatment repeat every 4 week minimum 6 course , 2 course maximum response unless unacceptable toxic effect disease progression occur . Patients follow death .
